name: Tears of the Dragon
description:
Our story takes place long ago. It was in a time when humans and dragons lived together in a peaceful serenity. However, a war was brewing. It is your quest to restore peace.

Controls
W,A,S,D or arrow keys to move.

Soundtrack by Nester's Quest.

Notes: Tears of the Dragon was created in 3 days. It's basically Pac-Man with dragons!
